channel.title: Hello! Hong Kong Player from Peking University here
channel.description:
My in-game name is Homagod!
I had introduce this game to my friend in Peking hahaha, but the language barrier is a thing!
BTW give me credit for that crossbow execution, I suggested that in Discord wwwwww

item.title: Hello! Hong Kong Player from Peking University here
item.dc:creator: charleslikwunyu
item.description:
We speak Cantonese, but it is pointless to make a Cantonese Wiki because we write in traditional Chinese, and most of us are good in English too! And of course I am interested in helping you guys with the public Wikia!!!

*BTW I sent you few private messages.

Read full topic

item.title: Hello! Hong Kong Player from Peking University here
item.dc:creator: Insanity
item.description:
歡迎

I am from Taiwan, lol.

Language barrier is definitely a problem though, so I guess lets start translating

Read full topic
item.source: Hello! Hong Kong Player from Peking University here

item.title: Hello! Hong Kong Player from Peking University here
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
charleslikwunyu:

Ahh right, I could help in your “localization” plan in China. @GM

Heya – I live in Taiwan. Do you speak… Cantonese, is it? We have a traditional/simplified Chinese page, but we don’t have a Cantonese Wikia yet. Would you be interested in helping us with our public Wikia? These are the grounds we’ll use later for localization ~ the English one: https://tol.wikia.com

charleslikwunyu:

BTW give me credit for that crossbow execution, I suggested that in Discord wwwwww

We had tons of people suggest crossbow but I’ve been wanting to do Crossbow ever since [without spoilers] “that one Game of Thrones episode”, which happened a long time ago ;D you could also see a crossbow bolt in one of the death scenes, hinting we’ll have it later.

Read full topic
